name: Breakunity
description:
Breakunity

Destroy the blocks and do not lose your ball.

Some blocks can handle more hits. PowerUps give you more life, so you can boost your high score.

It will randomly generate 1 of 6 levels every time you start the game or destroy all blocks.

If you have no life left, you lose.

Controls:

  • move with A and D
  • throw with FIRE1/MOUSE1 or SPACE
  • pause with Q

For the best gaming experience, I recommend playing the game in full screen.

This little project was created as a warm-up for a course at my university.

This tutorial from Unity3D served as project basis.

https://unity3d.com/de/learn/tutorials/modules/beginner/live-training-archive/cr...
